segments.text: Yes . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am calling to query about some of your information .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We've got a bad line . Can you repeat that please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I said I want to ask about some of your information .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , the connection is terrible . I'll call you back because I can't hear anything .
segments.speaker: S2
